about_the_game:
· A casual online strategy game where you buy soldiers, assemble troop, and simply command them to fight. Together with your teammates, let your soldiers defeat the enemy. Each branch has its own strengths, rationally match your lineup, break through the other side's defense line, defeat all the other soldiers, or go to the other side's base camp.
· There are three arms in the game, respectively, melee, ranged, cavalry, each has its own strengths, such as cavalry mass, can break through the line of defense, forward charge. Remote units can cause a lot of output in the rear. There are many types of melee troops, and there may be a strategy for every situation.
· This is a lightweight game, characterized as casual and easy to use, with almost no learning costs, all you have to do is buy soldiers and click, move or attack. The game is divided into multiple rounds, round interval to obtain a certain gold, you can buy soldiers, according to the opponent's lineup with their own lineup, the victory of the first to reach a certain number of victories.
· Support local games or multiplayer online.And lobby matching is supported.

name: War of Charge

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: intel i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GT 730
  • Storage: 512 MB available space
